ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Interesting text (WAS:Interesting Giant in Warsliks Woods (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Sentinel isn t a big eyeball.  It s just an area affect spell (appears as a bunch of lights on the ground). Talies the Wanderer Check out the EverQuesting
ygData.messageBody:
At 09:42 AM 6/7/00 -0400, you wrote:
> > From: Talies the Wanderer [mailto:snicker@...]
> > Someone's got the "Sentinel" spell running.
>
>Gracias! I'll have to check out castersrealm now to find out if it could
>have been one of those big floating eyes I've seen around.
>
>Amusing anecdote: The first time I saw one of those eyes I was playing a
>gnome in 1st person view and someone had parked their eye just inside the
>bank facing the door. Scared the *^$# outta me!!

Sentinel isn't a big eyeball. It's just an area affect spell (appears as a
bunch of lights on the ground).



Talies the Wanderer
Check out the EverQuesting Bard:
http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/bards/eqbard.htm
